messageBody:
Hy,

I'm using JUnit for testing a standalone application, and I met a problem.
I have a while cycle in my code, wich runs in a thread. The exit
condition of this while is managed by another thread. In a given
moment the test runs only the thread with the while cycle, so I want
to test only the code behind the first thread. This means that this
cycle is an infinite one. At a moment (let's say, after 2 or 3 time
processing of the instructions in the while cycle) the testing
terminates, without any exception rasing, or error message, the
application simply stops. I suppose is something about timeout... (??)

Is anybody, who met this problem too? May I ask him to help me?
Thank's a lot!

Marti
